metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

articles.title: Removal of Topsoil and Organic Matter

requirements.description: Topsoil and vegetable matter in all unexcavated areas under a building shall be removed
requirements.exact_quote: The topsoil and vegetable matter in all unexcavated areas under a building shall be removed

requirements.description: In termite-prone areas, stumps, roots and wood debris shall be removed to depth of not less than 300mm
requirements.exact_quote: all stumps, roots and other wood debris shall be removed from the soil to a depth of not less than 300mm in unexcavated areas under a building

requirements.description: The bottom of every excavation shall be free of all organic material
requirements.exact_quote: The bottom of every excavation shall be free of all organic material

requirements.description: Excavations shall be kept free of standing water
requirements.exact_quote: Excavations shall be kept free of standing water

requirements.description: The bottom of excavations shall be kept from freezing throughout the entire construction period
requirements.exact_quote: The bottom of excavations shall be kept from freezing throughout the entire construction period

requirements.description: Excavations for foundations shall extend to undisturbed soil
requirements.exact_quote: Excavations for foundations shall extend to undisturbed soil

requirements.description: Minimum foundation depth for clay or undefined soils with heated basement or crawl space
requirements.exact_quote: Clay or soils not clearly defined: 1.2 m

requirements.description: Minimum foundation depth for clay or undefined soils with no heated space - 1.2m but not less than frost penetration depth
requirements.exact_quote: 1.2m but not less than the depth of frost penetration

requirements.description: Silt with no heated space - below depth of frost penetration required
requirements.exact_quote: Silt: Below the depth of frost penetration

requirements.description: Foundation depth exemption for accessory buildings with max 55 m2 area, 1 storey, non-masonry
requirements.exact_quote: accessory buildings not more than 55 m² in building area

requirements.description: Distance from finished ground to underside of floor joists for accessory building exemption
requirements.exact_quote: where the distance from finished ground to the underside of the floor joists is not more than 600mm

requirements.description: Foundation depth exemption for decks/platforms not more than 55 m2 area
requirements.exact_quote: decks and other accessible exterior platforms not more than 55 m² in area
conditions: not attached unless differential movement addressed

requirements.description: Clear height and width for deck re-levelling access passageways
requirements.exact_quote: passageways with a clear height under the platform of not less than 600mm and a width of not less than 600mm

requirements.description: Backfill shall be placed to avoid damaging the foundation wall, drainage tile, thermal insulation and waterproofing/dampproofing
requirements.exact_quote: Backfill shall be placed to avoid damaging the foundation wall, the drainage tile, externally applied thermal insulation and waterproofing or dampproofing of the wall

requirements.description: Backfill shall be graded to prevent drainage towards the foundation after settling
requirements.exact_quote: Backfill shall be graded to prevent drainage towards the foundation after settling

requirements.description: Backfill within 600mm of foundation shall be free of deleterious debris
requirements.exact_quote: Backfill that is within 600mm of the foundation shall be free of deleterious debris

requirements.description: Maximum boulder diameter in backfill within 600mm of foundation
requirements.exact_quote: boulders larger than 250mm diam.

requirements.description: Backfill shall not contain pyritic material or material susceptible to ice lensing in concentrations that will damage the building
requirements.exact_quote: backfill shall not contain pyritic material or material that is susceptible to ice lensing in concentrations that will damage the building

requirements.description: Concrete fill in trenches beneath footings for sewers/water mains shall have strength not less than 10 MPa
requirements.exact_quote: filled with concrete having a strength not less than 10 MPa to support the footing

requirements.description: Soil in trenches beneath footings shall be compacted by tamping up to the level of the footing base
requirements.exact_quote: The soil in trenches beneath footings for sewers and water mains shall be compacted by tamping up to the level of the footing base
